conversations_analyzed: 8-20 (total 20 conversations analyzed in Batch 1 so far)
update_notes: Major discoveries: Bilal's complete worldview (NurCoop manifesto + entrepreneurship beliefs), Eric Wilhelm relationship, NurCoop business, Bloom LGA performance data, prayer clock project

new_people.name: Sara
new_people.note: Possibly same person as 'Josephine' mentioned in NurCoop (needs verification)

new_people.name: Josephine
new_people.note: Co-owner of NurCoop with Bilal ('Bilal & Josephine'), may be alternate name for Sara

people_updates.writing_style: Professional, confident, avoids fluffy words like 'proud' and 'thrilled'
people_updates.communication_pattern: Iterative refinement of AI outputs to match personal voice

new_projects.name: NurCoop
new_projects.business_model: Direct sourcing from Kannauj India, fair trade, ethical production

sourcing.method: Direct from factories, traditional extraction methods

new_projects.name: Petrichor Oil
new_projects.description: Natural extract capturing the scent of rain on earth
new_projects.source: Lake in Kannauj, India (only place in world with natural extraction)
customer_quotes: Smells like a gentle shower in a forest
Smells like fresh soil after rain
Hot cobbled streets of Paris after summer rain
The absolute fire of this fragrance will have you deceased from love
new_projects.significance: Flagship product with 230 reviews, represents Bilal's philosophy of connecting to divine through senses

new_projects.name: Modati
new_projects.description: Original creative studio, evolved into NurCoop

new_projects.name: Prayer Clock
new_projects.description: Islamic prayer times visualized as circular clock with color-coded segments
new_projects.bilal_activity: Recreating from JavaScript to Python, exploring graphics libraries

new_projects.name: Youth Entrepreneurship & Employability Accelerators Program
outcomes: Effective community of practice (Training Partners and MSMEs) with improved capacities
Capable MSMEs operate successfully in complex economic environments
AltCity Impact / Bloom with strengthened organizational abilities

new_projects.name: Rockstar Guide
new_projects.description: Document for how Bloom works, operational guide
new_projects.status: Being updated with workforce well-being principles (2023-03-24)

new_projects.status_update: Check in Instance 2 conversations if this was launched

new_concepts.name: Baraka
new_concepts.bilal_usage: Run a company fueled by baraka, so work is blessed and money is blessed
new_concepts.application: Ensure no negativity enters production line, pay everyone respectfully, fair prices

new_concepts.name: Beautiful Globalization
new_concepts.creator: Bilal (NurCoop philosophy)
new_concepts.definition: Form of globalization focusing on appreciation of differences rather than creating bland culture
new_concepts.method: International team working with international craftspeople, celebrating long histories and beauty of different parts of world
new_concepts.goal: Help people travel without leaving their countries, understand integrated nature of world

new_concepts.name: Unexpected Spaces of Beauty
new_concepts.definition: Creating situations that satisfy meaning through beauty
examples: Community spaces of support in difficult cities
Businesses that cater to the needs of the marginalized
new_concepts.bilal_statement: I am someone who desires to create situations that satisfy my own source of meaning, which is to create unexpected spaces of beauty

new_concepts.name: Sources of Meaning
new_concepts.creator: Joe Edelman (explicit theory)
new_concepts.related_to: Values-Based Social Design, Come Alive framework
new_concepts.bilal_understanding: By identifying our sources of meaning and living them we come alive
new_concepts.bilal_work_application: Unlock human potential to seek meaning, and therefore happiness in the vehicles of entrepreneurship

new_concepts.name: Come Alive
new_concepts.creator: Joe Edelman
new_concepts.definition: By identifying our sources of meaning and living them we come alive. Coming alive brings us energy to do things
new_concepts.bilal_adoption: Central to Bilal's philosophy and Bloom's framework

new_concepts.name: Values-Based Social Design
new_concepts.creator: Joe Edelman
new_concepts.description: Design method making people's sources of meaning explicit so meaningfulness can be rigorously accounted for
new_concepts.bilal_study: Mentioned in Joe's bio when requesting recommendation letter

new_concepts.name: Workforce Well-being
key_determinants: Leadership behaviors (micro/under-management, recognition, empathy, psychological safety)
Design of work (overburdened, career growth, meaningful work)
Ways of working (always on, task-switching, control over how to work)
new_concepts.bilal_application: Improving Bloom's Rockstar Guide with these principles

new_concepts.name: Connect to the Divine Through Our Senses
new_concepts.bilal_statement: NurCoop was born from the desire to connect to the divine through our senses. We create products to know that God did not create humanity to suffer, but to delight in our senses and knowing
new_concepts.example_quote: Every time you smell a beautiful flower and smile, there's god waving at you smiling back
new_concepts.application: Products that evoke divine sense of beauty

new_concepts.name: Pursuing Meaning (Not Happiness)
new_concepts.bilal_belief: Pursuing happiness leads to self obsession and usually doesn't result in the goal, pursuing meaning often leads to pursuing happiness
new_concepts.definition: Pursuing meaning means living our values
new_concepts.mechanism: By identifying our sources of meaning and living them we come alive. Coming alive brings us energy to do things

new_concepts.name: No Death on My Hands
new_concepts.bilal_statement: I want to have no death on my hands, which means that everyone that works on nuries should feel like they are challenged, growing (positive pain), and happily engaged using their strengths
new_concepts.application: Team members should not feel like they are compensated inappropriately or trying to bolster weaknesses

new_technologies.name: Python
new_technologies.bilal_use: Recreating prayer clock, exploring graphics libraries

new_technologies.name: Etsy
new_technologies.bilal_use: NurCoop shop, SEO optimization, listing management

new_technologies.name: YouTube
new_technologies.bilal_use: Documentary about sourcing trip to Kannauj India

new_locations.name: Kannauj
new_locations.significance: Known for producing essential oils for 7000 years
new_locations.bilal_connection: Sourced oils for NurCoop, visited October 2015
new_locations.unique_product: Only place in world extracting Petrichor Oil (Mitti Attar) naturally

new_values_beliefs.statement: Humans created the political, social, economic and built environments in the world and have huge impacts on the natural environment. Because we created this, we can also make new decisions
Belief systems influence what we think we can create and social interactions influence our belief systems
Stability and security is good for creativity and innovation
new_values_beliefs.note: AI suggested this could be naive - struggle can also inspire creative solutions

new_values_beliefs.statement: We live in a capitalist world where having money matters, and also, the world supports that which supports the world. Thus to continue to experiment and do in the world we must find vehicles to put in our efforts that also remunerate us financially
Business provides a sustainable way to do and grow positive impact while helping people seek their sources of meaning and also is what can modify our political, social, natural and built environments
new_values_beliefs.application: Why Bilal focuses on entrepreneurship education

new_values_beliefs.statement: Create products which give people a sense of the sublime
Create quality products that help people know themselves, each other, and know how the world works
Create a vehicle through which we create meaning for the employees, partner producers, and customers

properties.note: May be same person as Sara - needs verification from later conversations

properties.mechanism: Identifying and living sources of meaning brings energy

timeline_additions.event: Bilal visited Kannauj, India to source oils for NurCoop
Worked on SEO optimization for NurCoop Petrichor Oil listing
Reviewed Bloom YEEAP evaluation report (RPS Team)
Studied workforce well-being research (Deloitte) for Bloom Rockstar Guide
Articulated complete worldview on entrepreneurship, meaning, and values (350+ word manifesto)
Drafted UK visa recommendation letters from Eric Wilhelm and Joe Edelman
Helped Sara and Mohammed with fitness/body composition tracking
Developed Prayer Clock project (Islamic prayer times visualization)

caps_confirmed: Getting lost in research and exploration (prayer clock, frameworks, SEO optimization)
iaps_confirmed: Business performance optimization (SEO for NurCoop, Bloom evaluations)

new_tensions.name: Divine Beauty vs Commercial Success
new_tensions.description: Wanting to create sublime, meaning-filled products while needing to optimize for Etsy sales
new_tensions.evidence: Spent time on SEO optimization while maintaining spiritual philosophy

new_tensions.name: Idealism vs Capitalism
new_tensions.description: Believing humans can change systems while acknowledging need to operate within capitalist reality
new_tensions.evidence: Manifesto on entrepreneurship acknowledges 'we live in a capitalist world where having money matters'

bilal_uses_ai_for: Iterative refinement to match his voice
bilal_communication_style: Starts with AI output, then refines iteratively
Provides examples of his own writing to guide AI
Asks AI to challenge his thinking ('tell me how these beliefs could be naive')
bilal_values_emerging: No death on my hands (everyone growing)
Meaning leads to happiness (not vice versa)
